root.name: Dorei Toushi F: Battle Slave Fantasia
root.description: Overview Things can get pretty messy. Be prepared for some mighty blows. 奴隷闘士2 is a one-on-one fighting game similar to Guilty Gear, but heavily focused on brutality and hentai. It features six playable characters (2 male, 4 female) that fight with various weapons such as swords or axes. Battles end with fatalities consisting of two phases. In the first the opponent gets beaten and humiliated (that involves beating, electrocution etc.) and in the second simply killed. The interesting fact is that male charactes come out of these moves physically intact while female ones get stripped and bruised in the first phase and cut in half in the second. The game also features heavily erotic endings involving sexual intercourse. Game modesstoryversuspractice Playable characters Oh those busty warriors... AlfredBerserkerSarahNataliaCindy Mao
